snarl.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if an animal snarls, it makes a low angry sound and shows its teeth
snarl.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The dog growled and snarled at me.
snarl.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to speak or say something in a nasty, angry way
snarl.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: The traffic was snarled up on both sides of the road.
snarl.translation[0].definitions[2].note: Snarl is usually passive in this meaning
